<ce:section-title>Synthesis of {[Cd<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(oba)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(IP)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)]·H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O}<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0030" view="all">The synthesis of complex <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>: a mixture of Cd(Ac)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·2H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>oba (0.3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), IP (0.3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (6<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) and CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>OH(6<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) was stirred at room temperature for 2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h. The solution was putted into the Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL), sealed and heated up to 160<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C, maintained for 72<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h. Then it slowly cooled down to room temperature, yellow crystals were obtained. Yield: 58%. <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">27</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">18</ce:inf>CdN<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>: C, 53.48; H, 2.99; N, 9.24. Found: C, 53.43; H, 2.99; N, 9.23%. <ce:bold>IR</ce:bold> (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3417(m), 3068(w), 1652(s), 1595(s), 1531(m), 1387(s), 1301(w), 1232(s), 1158(m), 1076(m), 1009(w), 946(m), 877(m), 806(m), 773(m), 733(m), 691(w), 637(m), 613(w), 522(w), 499(w).</ce:para><ce:section-title>Synthesis of {[Mn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(IP)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>(oba)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]·(oba)(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>}<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0035" view="all">The synthesis method of complex <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> was similar to <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>, yellow crystals were obtained. Yield: 53%. <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">94</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">60</ce:inf>Mn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">19</ce:inf>: C, 61.73; H, 3.12; N, 12.21. Found: C, 61.78; H, 2.99; N, 3.31%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3445(m), 3125(w), 2859(w), 1919(w), 1694(s), 1597(s), 1559(s), 1497(m), 1397(s), 1354(s), 1239(s), 1156(s), 1072(w), 1009(w), 934(m), 875(m), 850(w), 815(w), 778(m), 733(w), 698(w), 634(w), 539(w), 512(w), 493(w).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of {[Cd2(oba)2(IP)2(H2O)]⋅H2O} n  (1)

The synthesis of complex 1: a mixture of Cd(Ac)2⋅2H2O (0.2mmol), H2oba (0.3mmol), IP (0.3mmol), H2O (6mL) and CH3OH(6mL) was stirred at room temperature for 2h. The solution was putted into the Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25mL), sealed and heated up to 160°C, maintained for 72h. Then it slowly cooled down to room temperature, yellow crystals were obtained. Yield: 58%. Anal. Calc. for C27H18CdN4O6: C, 53.48; H, 2.99; N, 9.24. Found: C, 53.43; H, 2.99; N, 9.23%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3417(m), 3068(w), 1652(s), 1595(s), 1531(m), 1387(s), 1301(w), 1232(s), 1158(m), 1076(m), 1009(w), 946(m), 877(m), 806(m), 773(m), 733(m), 691(w), 637(m), 613(w), 522(w), 499(w).

Synthesis of {[Mn2(IP)4(oba)2]⋅(oba)(H2O)2} n  (2)

The synthesis method of complex 2 was similar to 1, yellow crystals were obtained. Yield: 53%. Anal. Calc. for C94H60Mn2N16O19: C, 61.73; H, 3.12; N, 12.21. Found: C, 61.78; H, 2.99; N, 3.31%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3445(m), 3125(w), 2859(w), 1919(w), 1694(s), 1597(s), 1559(s), 1497(m), 1397(s), 1354(s), 1239(s), 1156(s), 1072(w), 1009(w), 934(m), 875(m), 850(w), 815(w), 778(m), 733(w), 698(w), 634(w), 539(w), 512(w), 493(w).

{[Mn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(IP)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>(oba)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]·(oba)(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>}<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (2)
